org.apache.cayenne.project.validator
Class Validator

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.cayenne.project.validator.Validator

public class Validator
extends Object

Validator is used to validate Cayenne projects.

Method Detail

getProject

public Project getProject()
Returns the project.

Returns:
Project

reset

protected void reset()
Resets internal state. Called internally before starting validation.

getMaxSeverity

public int getMaxSeverity()
Returns maximum severity level encountered during the last validation run.

registerValidated

public void registerValidated(int severity,
                              String message,
                              ProjectPath treeNodePath)
Registers validation result. Increases internally stored max severity if result parameter has a higher severity then the current value. Leaves current value unchanged otherwise.

registerError

public void registerError(String message,
                          ProjectPath treeNodePath)

registerWarning

public void registerWarning(String message,
                            ProjectPath treeNodePath)

validationResults

public List<ValidationInfo> validationResults()
Return collection of ValidationInfo objects from last validation.

validate

public int validate()
Validates all project elements.

Returns:
ValidationInfo.VALID if no errors were found, or an error code of the error with the highest severity if there were errors.

validate

public int validate(Iterator treeNodes)
Validates a set of tree nodes passed as an iterator.

Returns:
ValidationInfo.VALID if no errors were found, or an error code of the error with the highest severity if there were errors.
